name: Astro-Dots
description: Using a Google Daydream compatible device, learn about some of the different constellations that fill the night sky! The game features simple-to-understand, connect-the-dots style gameplay, where the player connects a web of stars with the Daydream pointer and transforms it into a full constellation. Featuring three different scenes with increasing complexity, Astro-Dots offers players an ambient and educational experience to feel immersed in outer space and become more familiar with the astrological meaning behind Aries, Leo, and Pisces.
